Michael Manning Weatherly, Jr. (born July 8, 1968, height 6' 2" (1,88 m)) is an American actor, best known for his roles as Special Agent Anthony DiNozzo on the television series NCIS, and Logan Cale on the television series Dark Angel.
name: Michael Weatherly
place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
